translations: 老兵，退伍军人；经验丰富的人，老手
经验丰富的，老练的；<英>古老的

sentences.sentence: He is a veteran parliamentarian whose views enjoy widespread respect.
sentences.translation: 他是一位资深议员，其观点受到广泛尊重。

sentences.sentence: "Hedge funds used to be set up by two guys in a back alley with a flashlight," says one veteran.
sentences.translation: 一位资深人士表示：“对冲基金过去是由两个人拿着手电筒，在一个偏僻的小巷里建立起来的。”

sentences.sentence: If your project is being resisted, for example, by a group of veteran employees, ask another old-timer to speak up for it.
sentences.translation: 例如，如果你的项目遭到一群资深员工的反对，那就另请一位老前辈为它辩护。
